title: Mojang：五周年生日派对我们玩的很开心
author: 乙烯_中国
txt_content:
本帖最后由 乙烯_中国 于 2016-3-20 17:58 编辑 


Dinnerbone: I just ate Mojang. Put it in my mouth and ate it. It was delicious. Now I have an aftertaste of liquorice though, which I do not like :(
晚餐骨：窝刚刚把mojang吃了！就放进窝的嘴里吃了！它很美味，但现在我满嘴的甘草味，窝很不喜欢。w(°Д°)w（这段晚餐骨卖大萌，窝就这么翻了）


shoghicp：Hoy mojang cumple 5 a?os! Gracias a toda la comunidad por continuar siendo tan asombrosa :) 
shoghicp: mojang今天五岁了呀，感谢所有为了如此惊奇的成就而努力并继续努力的人。ヾ(^▽^*)



Searge: We failed to protect it, everyone stabbed it with a knife and started eating from it. Poor cake... 
Searge: 我们没能保住它。大家都用刀刺伤了它，然后就开始吃分下来的残片。哦，可怜的蛋糕啊。。。



Kappische: Thanks for the cake @Mojang and thanks for saving my face @jeb_ haha
Kappische: 蛋糕好吃，先谢Mojang。再谢Jeb，谢谢你拯救了我英俊的脸庞。23333



Marc_IRL: Magic night at Mojang! Five player battle royale planechase with @SeargeDP @ProfMobius @shoghicp 
Marc_IRL: Mojang魔法之夜！和一群同事来了场planechase五人局。


PS：程序员居然在键盘上吃饭
PSS：你们开派对也一群人刷推特啊。
PSSS：在那群人打桌游的时候，没人抱的晚餐骨失意的在抱怨家里没电脑2333，/give Dinnerbone minecraft:hug 64 0 {Hold:"tight"}

replies.author: qweasdz
replies.txt_content: shoghicp是MCPE开发者，这人谁是什么鬼
他们玩的好欢乐{:10_519:}
玩的好嗨啊  = w = 我也想一起去 Q.Q{:10_492:}

replies.author: 白夜行
replies.txt_content: Mojang大大生日快乐{:10_523:}

replies.author: SuperXingYu
replies.txt_content: 庆祝MOJANG五周年！

replies.author: GWFblank
replies.txt_content: 太欢乐了 蛋糕好评

replies.author: MF_Mufeng
replies.txt_content: 玩得太嗨(????)?了，可惜我不能去。

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
嗨翻天了……
Searge这个萌卖得好

replies.author: mine米
replies.txt_content: 看着真幸福

replies.author: 旅行小哥
replies.txt_content:
蛋糕一看就很好吃
MOJANG生日快乐

replies.author: 浮云蓝天
replies.txt_content: 程序猿大聚会

replies.author: RuiFen
replies.txt_content: 他们好欢乐......

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content: 好凶残啊

replies.txt_content: 怎么还是在斯德哥尔摩的工作室？不应该在美国微软那吗。。

replies.author: andylizi
replies.txt_content: Dinnerbone再次卖萌，不忍直视

晚饭骨没电脑怎么祝福的
